Actions.Name: Get all or search entities
Actions.Description: Returns all or search entities registered under https://www.brreg.no/

Actions.Name: Get all or search sub entities
Actions.Description: Returns all or search sub entities registered under https://www.brreg.no/

Actions.Name: Get entity by organization number
Actions.Description: Returns a single entity by organization number (Existing or Deleted)

Actions.Name: Get entities updates
Actions.Description: Search for recently updated entities in the registry

Actions.Name: Get entity roles
Actions.Description: Returns all roles for a specific entity

Actions.Name: Get sub entity by organization number
Actions.Description: Returns a single sub entity by organization number (Existing or Deleted)

Actions.Name: Get sub entities updates
Actions.Description: Search for recently updated sub entities in the registry
